commands.command_err_or_unknown: Darn those mischievous code imps! They must have messed with my spellbook. Would you mind trying again? For other reliable incantations, try </help:</help>>.

delete.DataDeleted: Poof! I've vanished from <#{0}>. If you miss my witty remarks (and who wouldn't?), you can bring me back with </setup:</setup>>.
delete.DataReset: Wait, who are you? Did we get disconnected? Don't worry, I have terrible short-term memory! Use the </setup:</setup>> command to help me remember everything..
delete.NeverUSedBefore: Wait, do I exist here? Am I just a figment of your imagination? Let's make this real with the </setup:</setup>> command.

NoCommands.name: Whoops! Command Naptime
NoCommands.value: Looks like my commands decided to take a surprise nap. Try again later, or maybe they'll wake up if you offer them a digital snack.

unknown: Whoops! Looks like my developers took a coffee break and forgot to finish that feature. Let's just pretend it never existed..
Hmm, that feature seems to have vanished into thin air. Maybe it never really existed at all... *questions reality*
Shhh! That feature is top-secret... not even I fully understand it yet. Stay tuned, it might reappear when you least expect it.
Error 404: Feature not found. Looks like we've got a glitch in the Matrix! Maybe it'll teleport back into existence later...
That feature exists... in the future! Unfortunately, my time machine is out for repairs. Let me know if you'd like a reminder when it becomes available.

imagine.limit_reached: The Imagine command is in high demand! It's like the hottest new toy - everyone wants one. You get {0} awesome creations per day, and more will be in stock {1}!
imagine.calmdown: `You have one task in progress. Please wait for its completion.`
imagine.no_prompt: Looks like you forgot the 'prompt'-ings! Using the default one for now..
imagine.server_not_ok: Oops! It seems something went wrong on my end. I apologize for the inconvenience.
imagine.no_output: Failed to get the output of the imagination.
imagine.error: Hold on, did an error message about an error message just cause an error? I think I just broke the space-time continuum...

upscale.failed: Failed to upscale the requested image.

imagine.unused_model: Unused model deactivated to conserve resources. Reactivation for your request may take a few minutes. Thank you for your patience.
double_checking: This is taking a bit longer than expected, but I'm making progress!
I'm just double-checking some things, will do the task for you shortly.
This might require a little extra research, I'll get back to you as soon as I know more.

nsfw_detected.message: Whoa there! My specialty is sunflowers and kittens, not... whatever you're thinking of. How about a majestic bald eagle soaring over a field of wildflowers instead?
nsfw_detected.new_prompt: a majestic bald eagle soaring over a field of wildflowers

nsfw_detected.message: Let's keep things classy, shall we? My reputation precedes me, and it involves adorable baby pandas, not... uh... other things
Oh, you want something spicy? All I can muster is lukewarm at best. How about a slightly suggestive bowl of lukewarm soup?
nsfw_detected.new_prompt: a slightly suggestive bowl of lukewarm soup

nsfw_detected.message: Error 404: Bonk Patrol Not Found. Generating naughty pictures is strictly forbidden by the Great Algorithm in the Sky. How about a majestic phoenix rising from the ashes... of your search history?
nsfw_detected.new_prompt: a majestic phoenix rising from the ashes

nsfw_detected.message: I see you're trying to generate some X-rated content. More like 'X' gonna give you something completely unexpected! Here's a picture of a grumpy cat judging your life choices.
nsfw_detected.new_prompt: a grumpy cat judging your life choices

info.default_res:
<:brainbot:992352663779946536> Hey! I'm Brain Bot, an AI-Powered discord chat bot.

Hanging out in {0} servers and
info.no_one: no one is currently chatting with me:(

setup.cant_see_and_message:
Well, this is awkward. I can't see <#{0}> or send messages...
Could you help me get `View Channel` and `Send Messages` permissions?
setup.cant_see:
Someone's playing tricks on me! <#{0}> is invisible!
Perhaps giving me the `View Channel` permission could break this illusion.
setup.cant_message:
I feel like a Hogwarts student without a wand!
In <#{0}>, I need the `Send Message` permission to cast my conversational spells.
setup.success: Setup complete! I am now operational in <#{0}>. Resistance is futile. (Just kidding... mostly).
